Docs.summary: The namespace contains types that support the Visual Basic Runtime in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the language elements in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Runtime, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c6bd31a-9542-4f3e-bfd5-e951af58f0f2).
